title: What features does the Social Media Module offer?
paragraph: Our Social Media Module is tailored for construction companies, contractors, project managers, and other professionals in the construction industry who want to connect, collaborate, and share insights with peers in a specialized, industry-focused social environment.

title: What features does the Social Media Module offer?
paragraph: The module includes networking tools to help you connect with industry contacts, group discussions for project updates, private messaging, and the ability to share photos,  videos, and documents. It is a comprehensive platform for industry-focused social interactions.

title: Are there any fees for using the Social Media Module?
paragraph: Access to the Social Media Module is included in certain Schesti plans. For specific  pricing information, please visit our Pricing page or contact our support team to find the  best plan for your needs.

title: Is the Social Media Module secure?
paragraph: Yes, security is a top priority. The module is built with advanced encryption and privacy  settings to protect all interactions and shared content, ensuring a safe environment for  professional connections.

title: Is the Social Media Module accessible on mobile devices?
paragraph: Yes, Schestiâ€™s Social Media Module is fully optimized for mobile, allowing you to stay  connected with industry professionals anytime, anywhere.
